section.title: Requirements notation
section.t: The key words "MUST", "MUST NOT", "REQUIRED", "SHALL", "SHALL NOT", "SHOULD", "SHOULD NOT", "RECOMMENDED", "MAY", and "OPTIONAL" in this document are to be interpreted as described in .

section.title: Security Considerations
section.t: Note that agents adding Authentication-Results header fields containing S/MIME Authentication Method might be unable to verify S/&wj;MIME signatures inside encrypted CMS content types such as EnvelopedData (RFC 5652). So agents processing Authentication-Results header fields can't treat lack of an Authentication-Results header field with S/MIME Authentication Method as an indication that the corresponding S/MIME signature is missing, invalid or valid.
